title: Ep. 164 S&A Investor - Why Stocks Will Fall 25% This Year
itunes:title: Why Stocks Will Fall 25% This Year
description: Richard Suttmeier, chief market strategist at ValuEngine.com, expects stocks to retest their 2008 lows. He tells us what sectors will get hit the hardest - and the one you should buy right now. Rich also shares some of his best individual short ideas.
